title: Drawing, "Coast, Grand Manan, Canada", August 1851
medium: Black crayon, brush and white gouache on brown paper.
inscribed: Inscribed in ?, at top right: [date and place] / S-W-Head / [arrow with] W-S-W     10 P. M.
description: Horizontal view of the rocky coast shown at right forming a cove with a sailboat in the middle distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Coast, Grand Manan, Canada", August 1851.
August 1851. Black crayon, brush and white gouache on brown paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-17-a.
